item.title: LongVU: Spatiotemporal Adaptive Compression for Long Video-Language Understanding
item.description: LongVU efficiently processes hour-long videos by adaptively compressing spatiotemporal redundancy, achieving state-of-the-art video understanding performance.

item.title: LVSM: A Large View Synthesis Model with Minimal 3D Inductive Bias
item.description: LVSM: A new, data-driven view synthesis model outperforms current methods by minimizing 3D assumptions, achieving superior quality and scalability.
